website_summaries.verdict: A premium protection cover for anyone wanting to keep the bulk on their Surface laptop down to a minimum.
pros: Skin cover fits perfectly over the outer sides of current Microsoft Surface laptops
Cover adds very little weight to the laptop, making it perfect for travel and storing in small spaces
Translucent so the underlying logo and lights can shine through
cons: Can be difficult to get the cover over the laptop
Removing the cover is also difficult

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product. Only down side is there are no ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Only down side is there are no grips so if placed on smooth surface the laptop slides easily. Please add grips on the case next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Tarape

customer_reviews.title: A great Surface Laptop case.
customer_reviews.text: This case does exactly what I wanted it to. It provides great coverage, looks great on my Surface Laptop, and adds minimal weight. I am very pleased with Incipio case. The smoke colored one makes the silver laptop look really sharp. I would recommend this for any Surface Laptop. The Microsoft store should carry it but doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E Zuhl

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it does
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have nonslip pads and it’s super hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Works w/glass screen protector! No feet, but Incipio never advertised that it had them.
customer_reviews.text: Never said it had grips, and it doesn't. (If you check the product on Incipio's site). Fits with a glass screen protector, which is a huge plus. Just be careful when putting on the bottom with the fabric. Was pushing it at first. Had to use my nail to smooth it out underneath. Could cause long-term impression if not careful, but it is indeed lightweight and tight as can be to the body of the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Miri Kosta

customer_reviews.title: NO. FREAKING. GRIPS.
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything is great. Except one important thing, THERE ARE NO GRIPS ON THE BOTTOM. I didn't listen to the reviews thinking it wouldn't be much of a problem for me.... NOPPEEE. Definitely slides around like crazy on ANY flat or smooth surface. I'll be adding some adhesive grips but there's no reason for that price it shouldn't come with some already.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Webb

customer_reviews.title: The Color and Protection - Finally
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case that I have found that fits my Microsoft Surface Laptop. There have been a few that were not compatible, my fault for listening to another website. This is the first case, however, that really shows off the burgundy color of my laptop and it fits perfectly. The description for this product is spot on - lightweight and ultra slim. I'm very happy with this product and I only wish that I had purchased this one first. While it might be a little pricey, it was very much worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R. Edmison

customer_reviews.title: Color Issue
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to protect my new Windows Laptop so went shopping around for a good case. This one seemed a little pricey but thought the design and durability it would be worth it. The burgundy color was not at all like advertised in the product picture. Based on the description, I knew it was not an opaque case, but the color it came in was a barley there light pink at best. It did fit snug on the computer and seemed like the material would hold up okay but you can get better for $50. Especially for a simple one color case.
customer_reviews.author: A. Backus

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Installed case onto my Microsoft surface laptop 2 and it fits perfit. Only concern with the product is that it is slippery when on on my cooling pad easy fix i placed some rubber feet on the base of the case problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Blades

customer_reviews.title: Corners cracked and broke in two months with no dropping
customer_reviews.text: As with someone else who posted a picture, the corners at the top of my screen cracked, and today one broke off. This is without any dropping or rough handling. I'm disappointed as this was an expensive case!
customer_reviews.author: E. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product! It fit perfectly and looks great. To all those people complaining about it needing grips, yes it does, but it is not that big of a deal. Ive had it for over 4 months now and have not encountered any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for what it offers in protection for my surface laptop. I do wish it had grips of the bottom though and that the outside color didn't look so faded.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Marinho

customer_reviews.title: This is the best case you can buy for the Surface laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case you can buy for the Surface laptop. It is expensive but it’s superb quality. The color matches extremely well. It protects your wonderful Surface laptop while making it still look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best case that I found, its matte and clear-ish. I got the blue case and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Deya Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Protective Case for the Surface Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very protective case! High quality, and fits perfectly! Highly recommended to buy for the Surface Laptop because there are not many protective cases/covers that are made specifically for this laptop. A little pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but tad expensive.
customer_reviews.text: It made the laptop a little bulkier than I expected but it provides full protection from all sides and corners. Never seen this kind of a case for a laptop. When they say, it protects, they reallly mean it. Little on the expensive side but definite piece of mind if your kids are using the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar Parthasarathy

customer_reviews.title: I really like the case and how it fits
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case and how it fits. I would have given it 5 stars, but unfortunately, it gets scratched very easily just by being in a bag or backpack. Other than that, it is a very nice case with easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hope they bring it back soon.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3x of these and each one has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BigPopVFX

customer_reviews.title: Unstable without the rubber feet
customer_reviews.text: Fits good on the laptop, but very unstable because of no rubber feet. Too expensive for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Cracks very easily
customer_reviews.text: This product is not sturdy and has cracked and chipped in multiple places and it has never been dropped or handled in a rough way.
customer_reviews.author: My review

customer_reviews.title: Laptop case
customer_reviews.text: This fits well in laptop sleeves. It will definitely prevent scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Jo skyler

customer_reviews.title: Crack in one week!! Color is disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit disappointed when I received this case because the color is not what is advertised. The case is has a cloudy hue and not clear. It unfortunately hide the beauty of the laptop. Although I knew this from the previous reviews, it does not have a grip on the bottom... I actually don’t mind it because I slide my laptop around very often. What upset me the most is that it cracked after only having it for one week... it could be due my handling of the computer but all the cases that I’ve had before has never cracked so early.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany & Edward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection for laptop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop case. Exactly as described and easy to place and remove, even with the fabric surrounding the keyboard on these laptops. The color matches the computer perfectly. Doesn’t add too much bulk or weight either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Koch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This case I got for the surface laptop 1. I absolutely love this case. It doesn’t looks great on the laptop without compromising on the looks. It’s clear so the laptop is able to show through. It’s really durable, except that it doesn’t have the little grip at the bottom so it tends to slide off table, which is defied because you’d think it would have grips for the price. You can just fix this by adding grips from the dollar store to the bottom. Any way the case is really nice and I definitely recommend it! Update: Seven months later and the case is going strong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: The case fits well with the laptop and it keeps the original slim feeling. The only glitch is the slippery bottom stand. It will easily move on a smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

product_meta.title: Incipio Cover for Microsoft Surface Laptop – Microsoft Certified Laptop Sleeve [Light & Thin | Non-Slip Feet | Soft Touch Coating] red 0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars40 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
